main event: A military personnel reported observing an unidentified object hovering over an area in Fairborn, Ohio on July 8, 1962.
interesting points: The object was reported by military personnel from a nearby Air Force base.
The meteorological conditions were favorable for visual sightings.
The object was observed hovering in the area for 5 minutes.
The object appeared brighter than the brightest stars.
The witness observed the object through both the naked eye and a telescope.
